segments.text: Alice , your father is amazing . He ’ s 90 years old and he lives alone in that big house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . He doesn ’ t like to ask anyone for help . My dad insists on paying his own bills and taking care of himself !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like my Grandmother . She was always stubbornly independent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that folks like my father and your grandmother are determined to be on their own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They see their independence as a kind of character strength .
segments.speaker: S1
